snippet.title: RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic Trailer
snippet.description:
RollerCoaster Tycoon® Classic™ is a new RCT experience, combining the best features from two of the most successful and beloved RCT games in the series’ history – RollerCoaster Tycoon® and RollerCoaster Tycoon® 2.  

RCT Classic includes a mixture of authentic playability, depth of gameplay and unique graphical style of Chris Sawyer’s original best-selling RollerCoaster Tycoon® PC Games, now enhanced for handheld devices.

Visit www.RollerCoasterTycoon.com for more information and Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/2hwl7rt
